name: vs Thor
description:
Face the mighty Thor in the Great Ragnarock Tournament as the cute little pumpkin :)
A challenging boss battle made in 3 days for the Mini Jam 89 

Use groundpound and throws to damage the God of Thunder.
Dash and bounce away to dodge Thor's attacks.
Destroy his dangerous lighting barrier by throwing his own Mjolnir at him.
Ans most importantly... Have fun :D
Good luck
______
Controls:
Walk - A, D or arrows
Jump - Spacebar
GroundPound - Spacebar in midair
Bouncy Dash - LShift
Weapon Throw - LShift while armed

Giguz - Code, Game design
likryt - Art, Sound, Game design

_______
PowerProof Studious
